TEXT.TITLE: SUN MICROSYSTEMS <SUNW> CONTRACT EXTENDED
TEXT.BODY: Sun Microsystems Inc said it has received a one-year 15 mln dlr renewal of its agreement to provide Interleaf Inc <LEAF> with Sun-3 technical workstations on an original equipment basis. Reuter
